sourcesContent:
About Me

I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer specializing in the MEAN stack with over 3 years of professional experience building robust, scalable web applications.

My journey in web development started with a curiosity about how websites work, which led me to dive deep into both frontend and backend technologies. I love solving complex problems and turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
